prompts.goal: Create a concise GUIDE.md that serves as a personal architecture build guide for ATHENA — summarizing what's been completed, the current project state, and what remains to plan and build, ordered by dependency and priority.
Extend the LEL IR prototype crate with a CausalOverlay struct, by_id index, O(n) overlay construction, and R14 confounder detection query
Implement R17 and R18 query methods on CausalOverlay with 15 tests, clippy compliance, and FINDINGS.md update
Implement a GROMACS adapter module for the LEL IR prototype, parsing real .mdp and .log files into LayeredEventLog with 22 new tests
Address 3 warnings and 1 coverage gap from GROMACS adapter code review
Implement VASP adapter for ATHENA trace-semantics IR prototype with hidden confounder litmus test
Investigate and formalize the R17 prediction-observation comparison mechanism for ATHENA's trace-semantics IR

Investigate how convergence trajectories should be represented in ATHENA's IR (raw time series, classified patterns, derived features, or a hybrid), by cataloging current adapter usage, steel-manning each option, tracing downstream consumers (LFI/BSE/ComparisonProfileV1), and documenting the recommendation as a Step 13 entry in trace-semantics FINDINGS.md.

Investigate WDK#40 by surveying external UQ/V&V frameworks, tracing 6 consumers against 3 candidate schemas, assessing cross-adapter feasibility, steel-manning/stress-testing candidates, specifying the recommended UncertaintySummary schema, and writing the Step 14 FINDINGS.md entry
Define and stress-test three candidate aggregation functions for ATHENA adversarial-reward track
Implement Session 2 of adversarial reward aggregation research — structural fixes, parameter sweep, calibration, and correlation analysis
Implement hybrid aggregation candidate (HTG-gated product combination) targeting 7/7 stress-test passes

Implement a perturbation robustness test for the hybrid aggregation candidate that systematically varies fixture parameters across all 7 scenarios, producing a robustness map with pass/fail regions, margins, and tipping points
Implement ceiling analysis for ATHENA hybrid aggregation BF normalization saturation, testing alternative normalizations with full 7-scenario evaluation
Implement stretch test script for post-ceiling hybrid aggregation candidate with calibration simulation, correlation robustness, and output generation
Determine whether hybrid failure modes fall within realistic DSL operating ranges, then codify x0>=0 guardrail to unblock Session 6

Integrate the locked AggregateScore contract into ATHENA architecture: update ARCHITECTURE.md, create implementation beads, define acceptance tests, wire revisit triggers into monitoring — no retuning of parameters
Implement BF normalization seam, x0 guardrail, and decomposition invariant in adversarial-reward aggregation prototype with 7-scenario baseline margin parity verification

Create a structured prompt that instructs an AI to implement an acceptance test suite for the ATHENA adversarial-reward aggregation prototype, covering three contracts (margin parity, guardrail rejection, decomposition invariant) as automated regression gates.

Implement continuous monitoring hooks (triggers T1-T5, contract metadata emission, deterministic drift report) for the locked AggregateScore contract, converting Session 9's one-time acceptance proof into an ongoing regression alarm system.

Implement a GitHub Actions CI gate that runs both acceptance_test.py and monitoring_hooks.py on every push/PR to master, failing on non-zero exit, uploading artifacts, with FINDINGS.md Session 11 entry and bead management
Enforce contract-gate CI check via GitHub branch protection on master requiring contract-verification, prove with pass/fail PRs, record Session 12 evidence in FINDINGS.md
Close admin direct-push bypass on master with enforce_admins=true, prove direct push rejected, confirm PR path works, clean up S12 PRs, record Session 13 evidence
Codify governance chain into repeatable audit runbook with exact commands and break-glass procedure with explicit guardrails
Build a Session 16 plan that automates the governance audit via a read-only C1-C7 script, rehearses break-glass as a tabletop drill, and defines per-check escalation thresholds
Extend break-glass procedure with outage-mode fallback paths, operator decision tree, evidence capture, and tabletop drill
Sandboxed live drill of Mode B and Mode C outage procedures with real timestamps, evidence capture, and policy window validation
Close WDK#41 bookkeeping, begin WDK#43 convergence-summary derivation for GROMACS/OpenMM

Create a structured implementation prompt for ATHENA Session 20 that extracts shared convergence derivation, adds canonical taxonomy with cross-framework mapping (WDK#42), documents placement decision rationale (WDK#44), extends OpenMM CSV parser, writes equivalence tests, and preserves provenance invariants

Validate the Session 20 OpenMM CSV parser against real StateDataReporter output variants (column orders, optional columns, unit labels) to confirm or fix canonical convergence labels before downstream causal reasoning depends on them — scoped as a reality-check session, not a redesign
Validate GROMACS md.log parser against realistic format variations with source tier citations, dual-tier tests, minimal fixes, and FINDINGS.md update
